ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin ), Surround_Priced_Account__c <> null , Quote_Type__c = 'CQ', OR(Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Expiration_Date__c < Today(), PRIORVALUE(Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Expiration_Date__c) < Today()), NOT(ISNEW()), CQ_isRebid_Done__c = false, OR(AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c,'Closed(not won)')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c,'Draft'))), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c,'Closed(not won)'), OR(ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Name__c ), ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Description__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Lead__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Sales_Lead__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Servies_components__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Notes__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Active__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Value__c ), ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Expiration_Date__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Master_Quote__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Master_Quote_Quantity__c ), ISCHANGED(Account_Legal_Entity__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Customer_Organization_Segment__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Customer_Project_Code__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Customer_Project_Site_City__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Customer_Project_Site_State__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Customer_Request_Number__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Initial_Pricing_Date__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Due_Date__c ), ISCHANGED(CQ_Submitted_to_Customer_Date__c )))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote Expiration Date is in the past, please Rebid
